channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 03:03 Alarm response in Ternopil region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 03:03 Alarm response in Ternopil region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Тернопильська_область This is a warning from the official Ukranian Air Monitoring System, and may indicate a potential or immiment air-based attack or other threat.
